flags.title: User-Contributed Project
flags.text: This project guide is not managed by MAKE staff.

guide.introduction: Making a yarn dispenser from your favorite VHS cassette takes only 5 minutes with this guide from Skeined Productions.
guide.introduction_rendered:
Making a yarn dispenser from your favorite VHS cassette takes only 5 minutes with this guide from Skeined Productions.

Relevant parts
  • VHS Cassette
  • Yarn, string, or other cord
Tools
  • Scissors
  • Screwdriver, small, Phillips

lines.text: Using the screwdriver, remove all 5 screws and keep them because they will be needed for later. Open up the VHS cassette by gently pulling the back straight off the bottom.
lines.text_raw: Using the screwdriver, remove all 5 screws and keep them because they will be needed for later. Open up the VHS cassette by gently pulling the back straight off the bottom.

lines.text: Don't worry about parts falling off or falling around; none of them are needed later except the two tape reels.
lines.text_raw: Don't worry about parts falling off or falling around; none of them are needed later except the two tape reels.

lines.text: Snap off the metal spring either by prying with a screwdriver or by gripping with pliers and tugging gently.
lines.text_raw: Snap off the metal spring either by prying with a screwdriver or by gripping with pliers and tugging gently.

lines.text: First remove all of the actual magnetic tape. (Save the tape and see my other projects on how to crochet the tape into a handle for a VHS cassette clutch!) Wrap the yarn around the spools (you can use the same color or two colors). Be careful not to knot the yarn around the center of the spool; this way the last bit isn't wasted.
lines.text_raw: First remove all of the actual magnetic tape. (Save the tape and see my other projects on how to crochet the tape into a handle for a VHS cassette clutch!) Wrap the yarn around the spools (you can use the same color or two colors). Be careful not to knot the yarn around the center of the spool; this way the last bit isn't wasted.

lines.text: Place spools back into the cassette and orient the yarn so it comes out around the screw holes so when put back together the yarn doesn't get crunched. Make sure when placing the two halves back together that the lid goes back on at the same time.
lines.text_raw: Place spools back into the cassette and orient the yarn so it comes out around the screw holes so when put back together the yarn doesn't get crunched. Make sure when placing the two halves back together that the lid goes back on at the same time.

lines.text: Screw the cassette back together and enjoy your two-color yarn dispenser!!!
lines.text_raw: Screw the cassette back together and enjoy your two-color yarn dispenser!!!

guide.summary: Turn a VHS cassette into a nifty two-color yarn dispenser!
guide.title: VHS Cassette Yarn Dispenser!
